title: Seeking Human Kindness
description: "Seeking Human Kindness" is a compilation of inspirational true short stories, collected from across the globe over the course of a year. Stories hail from every populated continent in the world, including: Africa, Asia, Europe, North, Central, and South America. The stories focus on the effects "random acts of kindness" have had on the benefactors and recipients of good deeds. It proves the adage is true: "no good deed is ever forgotten".
author: Reading Harbor
